    • Method Detail

      • buildBoundingBox

        public org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair<IPosition,IPosition> buildBoundingBox(double r)
        Description copied from interface: IPosition
        Given a range, produces two coordinates, representing two opposite vertices of the hypercube having the current coordinate as center and circumscribing the hypersphere defined by the range. In the case of two dimensional coordinates, it must return the opposite vertices of the square circumscribing the circle with center in this position and radius range.
        Specified by:
        buildBoundingBox in interface IPosition
        Parameters:
        r - the radius of the hypersphere
        Returns:
        the vertices of the circumscribed hypercube
